00082 
00086                 struct TrueType
00087                 {
00088                         char dummy[2];

00116                 template<typename T>
00117                 struct IsStreamable
00118                 {
00119                         static FalseType testStreamable
00120                                 ( const StreamableResult& );

00123                                 (...);

00126                                 sizeof( testStreamable( getT< std::ostream& >() << getT< T const & >() ) ) ==
